```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library("tidytuesdayR")
library("ggplot2")

tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2024-12-24')

global_holidays <- tuesdata$global_holidays
monthly_passengers <- tuesdata$monthly_passengers
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
ggplot(monthly_passengers, aes(x = Month)) +
  geom_point(aes(y = Domestic, color = "Domestic"), size = 3) +  # Domestic passengers (blue dots)
  geom_point(aes(y = International, color = "International"), size = 3) +  # International (red dots)
  labs(title = "Monthly Air Passengers",
       x = "Month",
       y = "Passengers (in thousands)",
       color = "Flight Type")

```
